ایس ایم یو-30 جرمن آبدوز کی سطح پر وزن 6: What was the surface displacement of German submarine SM U-30? SM U-30 submarine surface weight
SM U-30 (Germany) History  German Empire  Displacement 675 t (664 long tons) surfaced 878 t (864 long tons) submerged Length 64.70 m (212 ft 3 in) (o/a) Beam 6.32 m (20 ft 9 in)
What was the surface displacement of German submarine SM U-30? SM U-30 submarine surface weight

U-30 displaced 264 metric tons (260 long tons) surfaced and 301 metric tons (296 long tons) submerged. She had a single hull with saddle tanks, and was 121 feet 1 inch (36.91 m) long with a beam of 14 feet 4 inches (4.37 m) and a draft of 12 feet 2 inches (3.71 m).
